thread.title: Robin
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Robin

author: Robin
title: Robin
text: I looked for a Barbour jacket the colour I wanted on the Web (local stockists didn't have one), and found Country Attire had it in at a good price. Ordered at 14h00 on the 29th and delivered by DPD at 15h30 on the 30th.
